additionalProperties.description: A Kubernetes add-on profile for a managed cluster.

config.description: Config: Key-value pairs for configuring an add-on.

enabled.description: Enabled: Whether the add-on is enabled or not.

additionalProperties.description: Delegated resource properties - internal use only.

location.description: Location: The source resource location - internal use only.

referralResource.description: ReferralResource: The delegation id of the referral delegation (optional) - internal use only.

resourceReference.description: ResourceReference: The ARM resource id of the delegated resource - internal use only.

armId.description:
ARMID is a string of the form /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}.
The /resourcegroups/{resourceGroupName} bit is optional as some resources are scoped at the subscription level
ARMID is mutually exclusive with Group, Kind, Namespace and Name.

group.description: Group is the Kubernetes group of the resource.

kind.description: Kind is the Kubernetes kind of the resource.

name.description: Name is the Kubernetes name of the resource.

tenantId.description: TenantId: The tenant id of the delegated resource - internal use only.

additionalProperties.description: Details about a user assigned identity.

clientId.description: ClientId: The client ID of the user assigned identity.

objectId.description: ObjectId: The object ID of the user assigned identity.

resourceReference.description: ResourceReference: The resource ID of the user assigned identity.
